title: South Live: Friday 29 December - BBC News
summary: rail lines reopen after 'person hit by train ' .

documents.title: manchester united 0-0 southampton
text: manchester united 0-0 southampton
author: Alex Bysouth
BBC Sport

documents.title: see you next year !
text: thank you for joining us on south live for the last time in 2017 .
we will be back from 08:00 ( gmt ) on tuesday 2 january with the latest news , travel , sport and weather .
until then then you can keep in touch with our hampshire , dorset , berkshire and oxford facebook pages , or via our twitter accounts : @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid and @ twitterid

documents.title: stabbing and burglary suspects released without charge
text: two people arrested in connection with a reported stabbing in bournemouth have been released without charge .
at 06:37 on 6 december officers were called to an address in crabton close road , where a man was found with a stab wound to his shoulder and head injuries and was taken to hospital for treatment .
the injured man , 27 , from christchurch , was arrested on sus of aggravated burglary and a 30-year-old local woman was arrested on sus of wounding with intent .
they have both now been released without charge and dorset police said it is not looking for anyone else in connection with the incident .

documents.title: bottle thrown at waitrose employee
text: an employee at waitrose in ringwood had a bottle chucked at his head during an assault earlier this month .
police say it hit him in the face causing injuries to his jaw and concussion .
it happened outside the waitrose store after a dispute between three men and the member of staff on the furlong on 1 friday december .
hampshire police has released cctv images of men its officers wish to speak to .

documents.title: cameras to enforce smart motorway rules
text: drivers could face £ 100 fines instead of warning letters for ignoring smart motorway lane closures in berkshire after road-side cameras were installed in a trial .
smart motorways operate variable speed limits and can open the hard shoulder to traffic to reduce congestion .
highways england expects penalties to be introduced from march for `` dangerous '' drivers ignoring red x signs on overhead gantries .
smart motorways are a feature of congested sections of the m4 .

documents.title: police fight festive period rise in hate crimes
text: thames valley police and the royal borough of windsor and maidenhead council are trying to raise awareness of a rise in hate crimes during the christmas and new year period .
officers are providing leaflets and advice to licensed premises , door staff and taxi drivers , who police say are disproportionately targeted at this time of year .
hate crimes are motivated by hostility towards someone 's race , religion , gender , sexual orientation or disability .
inspector lucy price said : `` during the christmas and new year period , more people are expected to be out enjoying themselves during the night time economy .
`` we want to remind the public that hate crimes can have a lasting effect on victims , so please be mindful of your behaviour and the implications your actions could have . ''

documents.title: siblings charged with slough shopping centre robbery
text: a brother and sister have been charged with a robbery at the queensmere shopping centre in slough .
marcel carpenter , 20 , and keonie carpenter , 18 , both of moray drive , slough , were charged in connection with an incident at about 10:00 on wednesday .
they appeared at reading magistrates ' court on thursday and were both remanded in custody to appear at reading crown court on 29 january 2018 .

documents.title: strike to hit new year 's eve trains
text: south western railway warns its services are likely to be `` exceptionally busy '' on new year 's eve due to strike action .
those travelling home from celebrations in london may also face long queues and crowded stations , it warns .
the company says the industrial action by rmt union will force it to reduce the number of available services .

documents.title: skoda driver sought after fatal crash
text: a potential witness to an accident in oxfordshire that killed a man and left a woman with serious injuries is being sought by police .
the crash was on the a361 near langford at 15:00 gmt on saturday and involved a white ford fiesta and a grey mg zr .
the driver of the mg zr , a man in his 30s , died at the scene and the driver of the fiesta , a woman in her 60s , remains in hospital .
police are calling for the driver of a silver skoda estate to come forward .
pc lyndsey blackaby said : `` we believe [ the driver ] may have been in the area at the time and may have some information that could assist the investigation . ''

documents.title: man needs nine stitches after havant attack
text: a man needed nine stitches after an attack in havant early on wednesday morning .
a 25-year-old man was assaulted by a man holding a bottle at about 06:30 ( gmt ) on foxcott grove , hampshire police say .
the force wants to hear from anyone with information and has released a electronic image based on the description provided by the victim .

documents.title: 'witness ' sought after fatal crash
text: the crash near langford in oxfordshire killed a man and left a woman in hospital .

documents.title: king may miss everton clash
text: bournemouth have several injury worries as they prepare to welcome everton in the premier league tomorrow .
josh king and andrew surman may miss the game through injury and charlie daniels and harry arter are due to undergo fitness tests having been out for the two previous matches .
meanwhile , jermaine defoe and junior stanislas have definitely been ruled out .
bournemouth manager eddie howe said : `` it is frustrating that we 've had a lot of injuries at a time when we 've had a lot of games .
our injury record has been good until the last few weeks . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: saints prepare for manchester united
text: southampton travel north in the premier league to face manchester united tomorrow .
they will be without defender virgil van dijk , who will join liverpool on 1 january .
charlie austin is suspended , although a hamstring injury may rule him out for the next two months anyway , left-back ryan bertrand will have his hamstring problem assessed .
southampton manager mauricio pellegrino said : `` manchester united are a powerful team , but we are in the moment that we have to think more about us and what we have to do on the pitch . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: 'heartbroken ' family pay tribute to 32-year-old
text: the family of a man from southampton who died after he was hit by a car say he will be `` sadly missed '' .
richard gardner , 32 , was struck by a ford focus on brownhill way on 22 december and died the same day at southampton general hospital .
his family say he was happiest when fishing and leaves behind `` a heartbroken mum , younger brother , sister , half sister and a huge amount of friends '' .
a 26-year-old man arrested in connection with the collision has been released from custody but remains under investigation , say hampshire police .

documents.title: two arrests after suspected arson
text: two men have been arrested on sus of arson with intent to endanger life following a fire in wokingham .
the fire at a property on patten ash drive was reported to emergency services at about 21:10 ( gmt )
no-one was injured , but the property was damaged , police say .
both of the arrested men , who are aged 55 and 57-years-old respectively , are from wokingham .

documents.title: search for driver after boy , 11 , hit by car
text: police want to talk to the driver of a car which hit an 11-year-old boy in andover before christmas ,
it happened on london road last friday at about 17:00 ( gmt ) and the boy suffered minor cuts and bruises .
pc graham taylor of hampshire police says the driver stopped at the scene , but they would still like to talk to them to `` establish the full circumstances '' .
he 's also asked anyone who saw the incident to contact the force .

documents.title: u-turn plane not struck by lightning
text: u-turn plane not struck by lightning

documents.title: three released in hit-and-run probe
text: three released in hit-and-run probe

documents.title: dorchester 'hit-and-run ' crash : three men released
text: three men who were arrested after woman died in a suspected hit-and-run crash in dorset have been released without charge .
the 39-year-old pedestrian was hit by a car on the grove in dorchester on wednesday .
she died later in hospital .
dorset police confirmed investigations showed vehicles belonging to the three men detained were not involved .
officers appealed for the driver involved to `` do the right thing '' and come forward .
i am making a direct plea to the driver of the vehicle that collided with the victim to please do the right thing and come forward .
a family have been left grieving over the loss of their loved one and are desperate for answers. ``
we now believe that the vehicle responsible has travelled down the hill on the grove and away from dorchester town centre . ''

documents.title: oxford mp : election was 'a very good result ' for lib dems
text: liberal democrat mp layla moran has been speaking to bbc radio oxford about the political year .
she won the oxford west and abingdon seat from conservative nicola blackwood in the general election .

`` on the night i had no idea until about 4am that we had done it , in fact i was called up by my agent at about half-past midnight who said we had n't , so when i arrived at the count it was a complete surprise . ''
she said the election was a success for her party which increased the number of mps it has from eight to 12 .
`` given it was a snap election actually i think it was a very good result . ''
author: BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: log burner 'explosion ' in midgham
text: a women has been treated in hospital after a log burner exploded , berkshire fire and rescue service has said .
firefighters were called to midgham at about 20:00 ( gmt ) .
they say the women sustained `` minor injuries '' .

documents.title: dorset echo : three quizzed over 'hit and run ' death
text: today 's dorset echo leads on the reaction of people in dorchester to a suspected hit-and-run crash in dorset .
the 39-year-old woman was fatally injured on the grove , shortly before 20:00 gmt on wednesday .
she was taken to hospital but died later .
today 's front : two lose their lives and one fighting for life following yesterday 's road tragedies .
read more at :
the roads are in such bad repair with no visible lines left and ruts and pot-holes - its not helping to save lives .
come on dcc do your part !

documents.title: lines reopen after person hit by train
text: trains have begun running between london paddington and slough again .
it 's after line was closed at ealing broadway when a person was hit by a train .

documents.title: police warning over new forest tree falls
text: # travelalert- due to a tree down the a337 southampton road lymington to brockenhurst is closed , the diversion is along marsh lane over the train line up to hachat pond then left to brockenhurst station then resume normal route we can not serve lymington hospital , ^sh
numerous trees down and roads closed around lymington .
currently sway rd , wheel inn , wainsford rd , warborne lane boldre , flexford lane sway , ampress lane lymington all closed due to trees and power lines down .
take care
are these open now ?

documents.title: inspectors to examine stricken ship
text: the maritime coastguard agency is carrying out a full inspection today of a russian cargo ship which became stranded in the solent earlier this week .
the yartsev ran into difficulties on boxing day and the vessel was towed into the port of southampton yesterday .
the mca will now assess the vessel to bring it upright and do any repairs needed .

documents.title: power cuts following bad weather
text: a number of areas in the south of england have reported power cuts following the strong winds and heavy rain which swept across the region earlier .
about 2,000 properties were without power at some point , with about 600 still off .
ssen expecting to have all properties back on the network by 16:00 .
properties affected are in the new forest , swanage , weymouth and the meon valley .
we would like to apologise to all of those without supply .
we have engineers on site at each affected area and are doing all we can to restore supplies as safely and quickly as possible . ''

documents.title: delays after train breakdown
text: a broken down train at hilsea is causing disruption to journeys to and from portsmouth harbour .
national rail says it 's blocked the line and another train is being sent to the site to get it moving .
some services may be delayed or diverted until it can be cleared .
the disruption is expected to last until 12:00 ( gmt ) , it says .

documents.title: fallen trees cause disruption on hampshire roads
text: new forest district council is reporting a tree down on the a337 between highcliff and new milton causing an obstruction to traffic following the stormy weather earlier this morning .

documents.title: police appeal after lead theft
text: lead has been stolen from the roof of a primary school in didcot .
all saints school was targeted at about 05:00 gmt , police say .
they 'd like to speak to a man who was spotted on cctv about the offence .

documents.title: lightning strike causes plane u-turn
text: an aurigny flight carrying 69 passengers from guernsey to manchester was `` struck by lightning '' over the isle of wight , and then returned to the island .

a spokesman from the national air traffic services said the strike at about 08:00 resulted in the aircraft gr670 `` losing some of its electrics '' and the captain decided to turn the aircraft round as a precaution .
the plane was on course to land in southampton airport , but the spokesman said this would have meant `` flying further into the storm at that time '' .
guernsey airport director , colin le ray , confirmed the aircraft landed successfully at 08:34 , and all passengers were being transferred to an alternative plane .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: trees down on marchwood by-pass
text: disruption for motorists and public transport users as trees have come down on marchwood by-pass near southampton during this morning 's strong winds .
# travelalert , due to tree blocking the road the 7:42 service 9 from langley is currently stuck on marchwood bypass , thank you for your patience , ^sh
he 's parked 90 degrees across the road , probably tried to turn around ?
good morning bradley , thank you for letting us know , ^sh
good morning !
that 's ok , hoping everyone is ok .
it was an interesting sight as we came round the roundabout !
its right by the roundabout where the 8 peels of to go to marchwood when heading to southampton

documents.title: tributes to oxford professor
text: the flag at oriel college , oxford , has been flying at half-mast following the death of historian , mark whiitow on the m40 .
the 60-year-old was a medieval historian and archaeologist and had been named as the next provost , or head , of the college .
prof martin conway , chairman of oxford university 's history faculty , said : `` the entire oxford community has been left deeply saddened by mark 's tragic death '' .
a 29-year-old man from warwickshire also died in the crash on the m40 near banbury on saturday .
the college flag is flying at half mast following the tragic news about mark whittow .
mark taught generations of oriel students and we were looking forward to welcoming him as the college 's next provost in september 2018 .
a huge loss , and our thoughts are with his family .
sincere condolences from all @ twitterid we 're thinking of mark 's family , friends , colleagues and students at this desperately sad time .
such sad news , i fondly remember mark 's lectures from my undergraduate days .
all of us in the oriel community mourn this loss .
such sad news .
my sincere condolences to all .
rip
what very sad news .
my condolences to you all .
what terrible news .
may he rest in peace .

documents.title: cyclist injured in weymouth crash
text: a cyclist has suffered serious leg injuries after being hit by a car in weymouth .
the 55-year-old man was taken to dorset county hospital following the crash on avenue road near the walpole street junction on thursday morning .
a 45-year-old man was arrested on sus of driving offences and released while inquiries continue .
police are appealing for drivers with dash cam footage of the incident to get in touch .

documents.title: ferry services hit by strong winds
text: strong winds have hit cross-channel ferry services .
the following condor ferries liberation services have been cancelled because of predicted sea conditions :
09:15 poole to guernsey
12:45 guernsey to jersey
14:45 jersey to guernsey
16:25 guernsey to poole
update | clipper sailed from jersey to pmth 1hr & 24 mins late at 00:24 on friday 29th december 2017
info| we 're sorry to advise that , due to adverse weather conditions , tomorrow 's sailing from portsmouth to bilbao is cancelled .
please call 01752 648637 for advice and alternatives .
we apologise for the inconvenience caused .
hello .
what time was this due to leave tomorrow ?
thanks .
hello oj , it was due to leave at 8.45 .
^mc
thanks .

documents.title: rail disruption after person hit by train
text: train services at a standstill after a person was by a train on the line between london paddington and slough .
heathrow express trains have also been affected .

documents.title: weather : rain clearing to leave a brighter afternoon
text: weather : rain clearing to leave a brighter afternoon

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to bbc south live on friday 29 december .
we will be bringing you all of the region 's latest news , travel , sport and weather until 18:00 .
you can keep in touch with our hampshire , dorset , berkshire and oxford facebook pages or via our twitter accounds : @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid and @ twitterid
